meanings.sent1: This cake is the flouriest one I have ever tasted.
meanings.sent2: The flouriest bread in the bakery always sells out quickly.
meanings.sent3: I tried to make a flouriest pancake, but it turned out too dry.
meanings.sent4: Her flouriest muffins were like fluffy clouds in my mouth.
meanings.sent5: The flouriest cookies melted in my mouth with each bite.

meanings.sent1: That bakery makes the flouriest pastries in town.
meanings.sent2: She baked the flouriest cake for the competition.
meanings.sent3: The flouriest pizza I ever had was covered in cheese.
meanings.sent4: The flouriest doughnuts in the box disappeared in minutes.
meanings.sent5: The flouriest biscuits crumbled delicately with each bite.
